document_data.name: Kaladras Yarlamm
document_data.mainbody: '''Kaladras Yarlamm''' was a [[Red Wizard]] of the 14{{th}} century [[DR]] who survived combat with [[the Simbul]], only to be summoned by her and die in combat with [[devil]]s in that year.
document_data.Abilities: He knew of a method to convert flames to [[acid]].
document_data.History: Kaladras Yarlamm once fought the Simbul and survived; unknown to him, however, she'd thrust some of her blood into his body, where it had lodged, making him vulnerable to her ''[[blood ring]]'' spell later on. Decades later, she used the spell in the {{yearlinkName|1372}}, calling him to her service in [[Avernus]], where he was killed before he could defend her.
